content: sts row 231 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 2 sts kfb k1 row 133 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 3 sts k1 kfb k1 row 232 kfb p to last 2 sts k2 146 sts row 134 kfb p to last 2 sts k2 97 sts row 233 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 3 sts k1 kfb k1 row 135 to 174 repeat row 1 and 2 of garter sec- row 234 kfb p to last 2 sts k2 147 sts tion twenty times 117 sts finishing and bind off row 175 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 2 sts kfb k1 rs k1 k2tog k to last 2 sts kfb k1 row 176 kfb p to last 2 sts k2 118 sts ws bobble all stitches in the following manner to ensure row 177 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 3 sts k1 kfb k1 a stretchy edge k1 *k1 insert lhn into the 2 sts on the rhn knit the 2 sts together through the back row 178 kfb p to last 2 sts k2 119 sts loop repeat from * until all sts have been bound off row 179 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 2 sts kfb k1 weave in ends block to measurements row 180 kfb p to last 2 sts k2 120 sts row 181 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 3 sts k1 kfb k1 row 182 kfb p to last 2 sts k2 121 sts row 183 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 2 sts kfb k1 ©2020 yarn twisters 3 equinox
